channel.title: Client Sided Object Loading?
channel.description:
Could anyone explain to me or send me a link about loading objects through my client, since I'm adding new areas and loading server sided causes people to have a few seconds to walk thrugh walls while loading objects :P
Thanks, Moose [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2009, 11:06:30 pm[/size][hr]Anyone got any idea's, I could've sworn there used to be a tut on this, but I couldn't find it anywhere...
